alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison, southwestern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Lake Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Dasher, Twin Lakes, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Clyattville, Hanson, I-75 At Exit 11 and Valdosta Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
